summary: An Ordinance granting to the Bon Marche Company, a corporation, its successors and assigns, a franchise to construct, maintain and operate a bridge across and over the alley in block twenty-five (25), A. A. Denny's Third Addition to the City of Seattle, for the purpose of connecting the building situated on lots ten (10) and eleven (11) with the building situated on lots nine (9) and twelve (12) of said block twenty-five (25) of said addition.
